Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems CHOLESTEROL HDL SL 2G
ELITech Clinical Systems CHOLESTEROL HDL 2G CALIBRATOR
ELITech Clinical Systems CHOLESTEROL LDL SL 2G
ELITech Clinical Systems CHOLESTEROL LDL 2G CALIBRATOR
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems reagents, calibrators, and controls for HDL and LDL cholesterol determination and quality control using colorimetric enzymatic methods on Selectra analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of HDL and LDL cholesterol in human serum and plasma and for use as calibrators and controls with ELITech Clinical Systems methods on Selectra analyzers to aid in diagnosis and treatment of lipid disorders, atherosclerosis, and liver/renal diseases.
